definition[0]: a vehicle that can be pulled behind another vehicle, used for carrying something heavy
definition[1]: a vehicle that can be pulled behind a car, used for living and sleeping in during a holiday
definition[2]: an advertisement for a new film or television show
definition[3]: an advertisement for a new film, television show etc showing small scenes from it
example[0]: The trailer was put through rigorous consumer testing.
definition[4]: a vehicle that can be pulled behind another vehicle, used for carrying materials or goods
